items.sentence: My mother hated caterpillars, not to mention snakes.
Tom drove to the police station as fast as he could.
You said Tom was kind and he certainly is, isn't he?
It takes a long time to build a loyal customer base.
Tom didn't believe Mary was trying to discredit him.
I can't believe that Tom never told Mary about John.
I can't believe that Tom made such a stupid mistake.
I can't believe that I actually wanted to marry you.
I just thought that you might want to eat something.
It's hard to believe that Tom could murder somebody.
